attributes.action: Stop the oil/petrol prices from rising further with windfull tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a time where energy prices have risen sharpley, shell have recored record profits of £13.9 billion which is simpley wrong.  A windful tax should be introduced which will help keep petrol prices down.  I also call of the goverment to hold a investigation in to the claims of rigging in the industry to keep prices high.
